title: Ticket #5848: condor_userprio may fail to display user priority factor with groups
description:
When running condor_userprio to display users that are part of a group, the priority factor field for that user may be incorrectly displayed as zero (or not displayed at all), when in fact the user inherits the priority factor assigned to the group.

The problem was that the Accountant code in the negotiator was not correctly sending the priority factor information to the condor_userprio when the user was in a group and the tool was not requesting rollup information.
